description: This Java class represents a data transfer object (DTO) for updating a note, including validation annotations and schema descriptions for API documentation.

classes.name: NoteUpdateRequest
classes.description: A DTO class used for capturing update data for a note, including fields for title and content with validation constraints and schema annotations.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the current title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note and returns the instance for chaining.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the current content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note and returns the instance for chaining.
